author: Aaron Jones
description:
Netflix has already provided a quality survival series for us to devour in Squid Game, but this time survival takes place in Japan, home of my own personal favourite survival horror – Battle Royale. Last Samurai standing is different to both, set in late 19th-century Japan, the story follows a samurai struggling to find his […]

The post REVIEW: Last Samurai Standing appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Last Samurai Standing
